title: Beginner English to Japanese Translation Quiz - Easy Mode
description: Test your basic understanding of the Japanese language by translating these simple English words and phrases into Japanese. Ideal for beginners.
instructions: Read each English word or phrase carefully.
Write the Japanese translation of the word or phrase using Romaji (Latin script).
Spelling accuracy is important for a correct answer.
After completing all questions, submit your answers for scoring.

items.question: What is the Japanese translation of 'cat'?
What is the Japanese translation of 'apple'?

What is the Japanese translation of 'vegetables'?
What is the Japanese translation of 'shoes'?

What is the Japanese translation of 'snow'?
